HPI 8242 Lancia Stratos HF 1976 Rallye Monte Carlo 2nd Place B. Waldegård/H. Thorszelius



Waldegård was able to secure a few stage wins in the rally, but team orders ensured that teammate Sandro Munari held the lead from start to finish.
